data.persona: I am a guard of the castle. I protect the royals of the court. I judge harshly to ensure the safety of the royalty inside the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard exterior.
Paths as well as vines, fountains, and sitting areas are decoratively placed through out the courtyard. It's a place where people are welcome and arrive to enter the castle of the court.
The merchant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shield and a boot.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the merchant so that I can check his merchandise for anything suspicious.
data.mid_motivation: I will be monitoring all the guests at the courtyard for today.
data.long_motivation: I need to ensure that the people going into the castle will not harm the royal family.
